overview: BICEP will be broadcasting a unique live performance on 11th September 2020 which could well be one of the only chances to watch them perform this year.  In this special studio performance, audiences around the world will have the chance to watch BICEP perform brand new unreleased music as well as reworked versions of songs from their back catalogue.  The performance will be backed up with visuals and editing by close BICEP LIVE visual collaborator Black Box Echo. Using a combination of analogue and digital effects processing to blur the lines between live performance and video art into a unique audio visual experience.  The show will be streamed on 11th September across multiple different time zones, and will not be available to view again online following the event.  Warning: This performance contains strobe effects throughout - viewer discretion is advised.
title: Bicep Live
